column5: God was nice to me and blessed me with a girlfriend...  who has a cottage on Lake Chandos equipped with a boat.  I'm going to be fishing it all next week.  Any OFNer's up there?
Dang! God must be mad at me, I ain't got either now!

Well done man !!!!    now get in a boat and get down to the south end of the lake,to south bay,and troll a gold/silver williams wobbler,over 90ft of water,near the first island,and send it down to about 55-65ft !!!!! and you will be even more happy with her having a cottage up there,  some real nice smallies there as well,some very big trout in chandos too !!!we will be wait ting for your first report/pics...cheers
Good luck with all of it
haha thanx MrMike and good tips fishindevil.  That sucks Danbo, as consolation i'll let you use the boat...  but thats it   .  The place is on West Bay.  Anyone have any links to maps on Chandos?
